request:
correct parent array path extraction for navigation

The issue was in getParentArrayPath() - it was incorrectly including the array index
instead of just the array name. For path 'root.accountParams[1].contributions[0].contributionType',
it should return 'root.accountParams[1].contributions' not 'root.accountParams[1].contributions[0]'.

This ensures the contributions array itself gets expanded, not a specific element.

testSteps: 2. Wait for differences to be calculated
5. Verify navigation to correct JSON node
6. Verify node is expanded and highlighted
expectedResult: The reported issue should be completely resolved without introducing new bugs or breaking existing functionality.

sampleData.description: Use sample files to test JSON comparison and navigation features

verificationCommand: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
